    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9299</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Can You Measure?</string>
            <string language="es">¿Puedes medir?</string>
            <string language="ga">An Féidir Leat Tomhais?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Können Sie Messen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pouvez-vous Mesurer ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pode Você Medir?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potete Misurare?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπορείτε να μετρήσετε;</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children will develop an understanding of the concept of measurement.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños desarrollarán su comprensión del concepto de medida.</string>
            <string language="ga">Forbróidh leanaí tuiscint ar choincheap an tomhais.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder entwickeln ein Verständnis des Konzeptes des 
Messens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants développeront un arrangement du concept de la
mesure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças desenvolverão uma compreensão do conceito 
da medida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini svilupperanno una comprensione del concetto 
della misura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά θα αναπτύξουν μια κατανόηση της έννοιας της 
μέτρησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
